name: Luminous Journey
description:
liluo link: Luminous Journey | Play on Liluo.io

this game was made for gdevelop 3rd game jam.

wasd - move

space (you can go to settings to change the key) - for switching colors

e - interact

Play as grey as you trek through levels.

Thank you for trying out this game!

credit: art and code by me, jfxr for SFX
